document.full_text: andal ampatuan sr., head of a political dynasty in the southern region of mindanao, pleaded not guilty to charges that he oversaw a massacre that killed at least 57 people.
document.title: clan leader in philippines pleads not guilty to 2009 massacre
lines_and_colors: andal ampatuan sr., head of a political dynasty in the southern region of mindanao, pleaded not guilty to charges that he oversaw a massacre that killed at least 57 people.
